npcs.name: Innkeeper Zahar
utterances: Greetings, friend! Please look around. You won't find better homes in all of Freeport ...

npcs.name: a seething kerra
utterances: Take care, friend.  Tempers and claws have been sharpened to a fine point, lately.
It is high time that the kin of Erud be shown just how sharp our claws can be!
